text: Peter Nicholls (8 March 1939 – 6 March 2018)Clément Solym, Mort de Peter Nicholls, éditeur de l'Encyclopédie de la science-fiction, 2018-03-06. Read 2018-03-06. was an Australian literary scholar and critic. He was the creator and a co-editor of The Encyclopedia of Science Fiction with John Clute. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview with Peter Nicholls by his daughter Sophie Cunningham * The Encyclopedia of Science Fiction, 3rd ed. title: Peter Nicholls (writer)
